00005 #pragma mark * #defines

00007 // Since simple integers take up the same number of bytes as a pointer,
00008 // and since it can be painful to maintain synchronization between the
00009 // extern declarations in the .h file and the assignments in the .m
00010 // file, I use #define for integer constants.  Actually, it's more efficient
00011 // since I don't need the definition for each value -- A constant used
00012 // in N places takes up only N integer-sized chunks instead of N+1.
00013 
00014 // No errors
00015 #define constBkmmErrorNone 0
00016

00067 // Use a localized word for "Separator" if in GUI project, where the SSYLocalize framework
00068 // is available.  Otherwise, use the English since no one will see it anyhow.
00069 #ifndef NO_GUI
00070 #define SEPARATOR [NSString localize:@"001_Camino_separator"]
00071 #else
00072 #define SEPARATOR @"Separator"
00073 #endif
